name: Menasting

aura.name: steel_scorpion
aura.description: When fighting together, increases the player's defense and Electric Pals drop more items when defeated.

description: Being made of pure energy, its insides are completely hollow. This Pal crams still-living prey into its hollow body, where it absorbs them. Hellish screams of pain can often be heard coming from inside this Pal.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: poison_blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: shadow_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: nightmare_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

skills.name: dark_laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
